alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:52PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laramie County through 630 PM MDT... At 551 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitaker, or 16 miles northwest of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Whitaker around 600 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 23 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming.
